title: Bug 49536: Accessing a URL with no webapps deployed returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
description: Ali Tokmen found that when accessing a URL with no webapps deployed in Tomcat 7, it returns an HTTP code of 200 OK with no content instead of the expected HTTP error 404.
OB: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and accessing a URL, it returns an HTTP code of 200 OK with no content.
EB: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and accessing a URL, it should return an HTTP error 404.
SR:
1. Download http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed
3. Access a URL
Expected: It should return an HTTP error 404
Actual: It returns an HTTP code of 200 OK with no content.
